resources: HTI Student Services المعهد العالي للتكنولوجيا يوفر هذا التطبيق بعض الخدمات لطالب المعهد العالي للتكنولودجيا يمكن للطالب أن يشتكي من أي شيء يريده وأيضًا يمكنه عمل الاستبيان للوصول إلى نتائجهم تسجيل الدخول رقم الطالب كلمه المرور مطلوب ! English ///////////////////////////////////////////////Questionner////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Curriculum Evaluation Form Name Course : Code Course : Group number : Name Instructor : Name Assistant : Students should choose the grade of assessment according to the following instructions : Completely disagree Disagree Not Good Enough Agree Completely agree (1) General opinions about the course 1.1- The course is interesting 1.2- The course is related to specialization 1.3- The course contains updated information 1.4-The course meets my expectations 1.5- The course is useful in scientific application 1.6- Course concept 1.7- The overall course is good (2) Targeted learning outcomes 2.1- The goals are clear and public 2.2- The course provides me with useful knowledge and in-depth understanding of the subject 2.3- The course motivates me to think 2.4- Earn professional decision-making skills that will benefit your business (3) Lectures 3.1- Lectures are offered according to the order of the tables 3.2- The lectures contribute to understanding the subject of the course 3.3- The lectures cover all the positions in the content 3.4- Lectures are presented in an interesting manner 3.5- Lectures included participation by students 3.6- The lectures included practical cases 3.7- The amount of information presented in the lectures is appropriate 3.8- A book or course (note) is considered appropriate (4) The Instructor 4.1- The instructor is always committed to the content of the course 4.2- The instructor is always committed to the start and end of the lecture 4.3- I feel that the instructor is always well prepared for the lecture 4.4- The instructor deals with the subjects of the course in depth 4.5- The instructor encourages students to ask questions and express their point of view 4.6- The instructor invests the lecture time in actual teaching 4.7- The instructor seems to have a high knowledge of the subject of the course 4.8- The instructor keeps my attention 4.9- The instructor treats the students with respect 4.10- The instructor presents examples and practical cases (5) Assistant Professor 5.1- The role of the assistant professor is effective 5.2- A assistant professor is always willing to answer any queries 5.3- A assistant professor appears to be familiar with the subjects of the course 5.4- A assistant professor provides us with enough applications 5.5- The assistant professor provide assistance to each student when necessary (6) Exams Systems 6.1- The exam schedule is appropriate 6.2- Examination dates are announced early 6.3- The number of exams in the classroom is appropriate 6.4- The examinations are objective 6.5- The time allotted for appropriate exams 6.6- The exams cover the content of the course 6.7- The examinations focus on the theoretical and practical aspects of the course 6.8- The language used in the examinations is clear and understandable 6.9- Examinations do not include typographical errors 6.10- The distribution of grades is fair (7) Laboratories and workshops 7.1- The institute has enough labs to achieve the objectives of the investigation sufficient to achieve the goals of the educational process 7.2- Factories have modern equipment and equipment 7.3- The design of the plants is attractive and appropriate 7.4- The technicians are characterized by high efficiency laboratories 7.5- The space available to the laboratories is suitable for the number of students 7.6- The workshops available are equipped with modern equipment 7.7- The size of the workshops is proportional to the number of students 7.8- The workshop technicians are highly efficient (8) Terraces and classrooms 8.1- Site 8.2- the size 8.3- Number of Seats / Punches 8.4- Teaching facilities (blackboard - data show - projector) 8.5- Quiet 8.6- Lighting 8.7- Cleanliness (9) Others * What you like or do not like in the course ? - I like in course: - I dislike in course : * In your opinion how can you improve or develop this course !? Submit 1 2 3 4 5
